title: Tiago's website

home.title: Hi, I'm Tiago
home.subtitle: Senior Frontend Engineer | React & TypeScript Specialist
home.paragraph: Self-taught developer with strong learning ability and collaborative profile. Passionate about technology and innovation, always seeking new knowledge. My artistic sensibility adds unique creativity to development projects.

skill_docs.mobile: This page is temporarily exclusive for larger screens!

rocket_chat.title: Rocket.Chat
rocket_chat.location: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil 路 Remote
rocket_chat.description: As a key contributor to the world's largest open-source communication platform, I was responsible for developing and maintaining high-impact features for millions of users. I collaborated daily with a global, distributed, and cross-functional team in a fully remote and open-source environment.Led the development of critical frontend features for the Omnichannel suite, enhancing live chat capabilities for enterprises and improving the integration with major messaging platforms, directly impacting user satisfaction and platform adoption.Engineered and shipped robust, reusable UI components through the UiKit lib, ensuring consistency across the Rocket.Chat ecosystem, including the apps marketplace.Significantly improved application performance and user experience by identifying and resolving complex bugs, optimizing React components, and implementing efficient state management solutions, leading to measurable reductions in load time.Championed code quality and best practices by actively participating in code reviews, contributing to architectural discussions, and increasing test coverage by writing unit, integration, and end-to-end tests with Jest, React Testing Library, and Playwright.Mentored junior developers and fostered a collaborative environment through knowledge-sharing sessions and constructive feedback, enhancing team productivity and skill growth.

canopus.title: Canopus
canopus.location: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil 路 On-site
canopus.description: Worked on the development of over 10 custom web system projects, with a focus on information security and tailored solutions for clients.Implemented integrations with financial modules, including bank slip generation and statistical reports for data analysis.Collaborated on modernizing and maintaining legacy systems, implementing new features and fixing critical issues that positively impacted over 50,000 users.
